challenge.title: Step 28
challenge.description: Provide the other menu options by printing the following three strings in your while loop: '3. Show total expenses', '4. Filter expenses by category', and '5. Exit'. Keep adding the print() calls in order.

tests.text: You should have print('3. Show total expenses') in your while loop.
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
call_lst = _Node(_code).find_function("main").find_whiles()[0].find_bodies()[0].find_calls("print")
test_lst = ["print('\\\\nExpense Tracker')", "print('1. Add an expense')", "print('2. List all expenses')", "print('3. Show total expenses')"]
all(call_lst[n].is_equivalent(i) for n, i in enumerate(test_lst))
`)) })
